fetchTagContent((string,address,bytes,ui.details: If given HTMLTag contains non empty contractAddress      this method will fetch the content from given storage      contract. Otherwise, it will return the tagContent      from the given htmlTag.

tagOpenCloseForHTMLTag((string,address,b.details: tagType: 0/HTMLTagType.useTagOpenAndClose or any other:          [tagOpen][CONTENT][tagClose]      tagType: 1/HTMLTagType.script:          <script>[SCRIPT]</script>      tagType: 2/HTMLTagType.scriptBase64DataURI:          <script src="data:text/javascript;base64,[SCRIPT]"></script>      tagType: 3/HTMLTagType.scriptGZIPBase64DataURI:          <script type="text/javascript+gzip" src="data:text/javascript;base64,[SCRIPT]"></script>      tagType: 4/HTMLTagType.scriptPNGBase64DataURI          <script type="text/javascript+png" name="[NAME]" src="data:text/javascript;base64,[SCRIPT]"></script>      [IMPORTANT NOTE]: The tags `text/javascript+gzip` and `text/javascript+png` are used to identify scripts      during decompression

returns._0: (tagOpen, tagClose) - Tag open and close as a tuple

returns._0: (tagOpen, tagClose) - Tag open and close as a tuple
